remarks: A lemma for eliminating an existential quantifier.  (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
exlimddvf.1 $e |- ( ph -> E. x th ) $.
exlimddvf.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
exlimddvf.3 $e |- ( ( th /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
exlimddvf.4 $e |- F/ x ch $.
exlimddvf $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
